scripts.setup: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; npm run start_database && node --trace-warnings server/app/init/setup.js; npm run stop_database
scripts.setup_dev: export NODE_ENV=dev; export ENV_PATH='.env.dev'; npm run start_database && node --trace-warnings server/app/init/setup.js; npm run stop_database
scripts.start_all: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; npm run build_client && npm run start_database && node server/server.js start_all
scripts.start_server: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; node server/server.js start http_server
scripts.status_server: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; node server/server.js status http_server
scripts.start_server_dev: export NODE_ENV=dev; export ENV_PATH='.env.dev'; nodemon --trace-warnings server/app/http/server_daemon.js
scripts.stop_server: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; node server/server.js stop http_server
scripts.start_fetch_tweets: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; node server/server.js start fetch_tweets
scripts.status_fetch_tweets: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; node server/server.js status fetch_tweets
scripts.stop_fetch_tweets: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; node server/server.js stop fetch_tweets
scripts.start_tweet_queue: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; node server/server.js start tweet_queue
scripts.status_tweet_queue: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; node server/server.js status tweet_queue
scripts.stop_tweet_queue: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; node server/server.js stop tweet_queue
scripts.start_fetch_stores: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; node server/server.js start fetch_stores
scripts.status_fetch_stores: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; node server/server.js status fetch_stores
scripts.stop_fetch_stores: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; node server/server.js stop fetch_stores
scripts.start_update_twitter_users: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; node server/server.js start update_twitter_users
scripts.status_update_twitter_users: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; node server/server.js status update_twitter_users
scripts.stop_update_twitter_users: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; node server/server.js stop update_twitter_users
scripts.stop_all: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; node server/server.js stop_all; npm run stop_database
scripts.status_all: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; node server/server.js status_all
scripts.build_client: export NODE_ENV=production; export ENV_PATH='.env.production'; webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.start_database: if ! pidof mongod; then mongod --fork --config mongo.conf; else echo 'Mongod is already running' fi;
scripts.status_database: if pidof mongod; then echo 'Mongod is running'; else echo 'Mongod is not running'; fi;
scripts.stop_database: if pidof mongod; then kill $(pidof mongod); else echo 'Mongod was not running' fi;
scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=testing; export ENV_PATH='.env.testing'; node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha server/test/**.js; npm run stop_database
